attributes.action: Ban Cyclists from riding on the pavement.
attributes.background: Cyclists riding on the pavement, are a hazard to everybody. I have had to step into the road to avoid being hit by a bike on the pavement. Even coming out of a shop or your own front door can be a hazard. Impose on the spot fines for offenders.

rejection.details:
The open petition similar to yours is here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/132068
